title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing. It is not clear why this is happening.
OB: When running the Control Example, resize the window vertically only. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
SR:
1. Launch the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically only.
3. Observe the flashing of tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
